name: Logical Lasers
description:
Use mirrors, portals, and many other exciting pieces to reflect lasers to light up the end point. Complete exhilarating puzzles across many different categories to test your problem solving puzzle skills. Can you solve them all?

Logical Lasers is a laser puzzle game with brand new elements you have never seen before, hop in and become a puzzle solving master.

Features:
Simple controls with engaging gameplay
Over 300+ puzzle levels of various categories including space, spotlight, and moving themes
Offline friendly allowing you to play anywhere!
